name: Ninja Live Chat | Fastest live chat Builder(With Elementor Supported)
author: Light Plugins

sections.description:
Finally we introduce Elementor supported chats.You can set the Live Chat the way you thought.
For Elementor Experts we have Elementor Widget.It needs just two clicks to activate a chat prompt on your website.
You can customize everything of the chats.If you don’t want to use elementor we have this option too.You can activate chat
prompt from settings page.In a word we made it for all kinds of non tech user who can easily integrate chat system on their website
without any trouble.

Why Ninja Live Chat ?

  • Fastest Ninja Live Chat Builder is the Fastest Live Chat builder.
  • Simplest Simple to set up.
  • Lightweight No un-used assets loads. Assets size is just 10kb.
  • Organized The plugin is well Organized to set up a new.
  • Live Preview You can edit and show live previews.
  • Elementor Widget We have Elementor Widget for Elementor Experts.
sections.faq:
Is The Live Chat customizable?

Yes, You can customize everything in the Live Chat.

Is multiple users supported?

Yes, You can add members as you wish.

Does it support Elementor?

Yes we have Elementor Widget to add chat on your website.
sections.changelog:
= 1.1.0 ( Date: July 02, 2021 )
* Added Elementor Widget
* Fix color changes issue
* Improve UI

1.0.0

  • Launched the Ninja Live Chat!

short_description: Display clean, customizable, and responsive Live Chat To Your Wordpress Site.
